name: Horse’s Neck
description: This recipe for the classic bourbon (sometimes brandy) and ginger ale highball came to us from the Campbell Apartment, a cocktail lounge in Grand Central Station.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces bourbon, rye whiskey or brandy

recipeInstructions.text: Pour liquor into an 11-ounce highball glass filled with ice. Add bitters and top off with ginger ale. Lightly stir and garnish with orange twist.
